original: gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin @236b gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa dang / theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang /

translated: The phrase they serve the transcendent lords refers to the stage of action in faith.
